Photongraphy


When I have time I like to fiddle around with photography.

As an open-source advocate I mostly use the programs digicam, darktable, and GIMP - all of which should be conveniently found in your nearest linux repository!

Here are some photons I've caught during my travels!


Me

pamfýll

"Pamfýll" is an Icelandic/Danish word which nobody really knows the meaning of. However, it is usually bundled with good luck. I guess I put it here thinking I might need it someday.
